duties_responsibilities.duty: Hands-on design, development, test and evaluation, and demonstration of advanced prototype software applications.
Apply state-of-the-art techniques using multiple programming languages and development environments to drive advances in mission capabilities.
Assist the task leader in user engagements and develop innovative solutions applying Agile Engineering principles.
Contribute to tasks as a member of the development team and provide technical leadership when required, documenting progress and results in technical briefings and reports.
Effectively communicate application capabilities and task progress with sponsors and the MITRE team, and work effectively in a geographically distributed environment.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Computer Science or Computer Engineering (or similar) with overall GPA of 3.0 or higher with less than 1 year of demonstrated hands-on experience in software development in a collaborative team environment.
Active Secret or Interim Secret clearance.
